message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
I'll take the lead, but I'll give you a small share
You're being generous, but I'm not that desperate yet. I'll take a bit more.
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a smaller share
You're not getting any younger, Bob. I'm taking a bit more this time.
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet
Time's running out, Bob. I'm taking a bit more this time. Don't make me go to the final rounds!
You're getting desperate, I'm not going to give in yet
I'm not going down without a fight, Bob. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it!
You're running out of options, I'm not giving in
I'm not going to get any more than this, Bob. It's your turn to make a decision.
I'll take the last chance, you're not getting more
